document.full_text: the head of the u.s. nuclear safety regulator told reporters on tuesday it was "not surprising" that japan's nuclear regulator raised the severity of its nuclear crisis at the fukushima daiichi nuclear plant to a level 7 from 5.
document.title: nrc: "not surprising" japan raised nuclear severity
lines_and_colors: the head of the u.s. nuclear safety regulator told reporters on tuesday it was "not surprising" that japan's nuclear regulator raised the severity of its nuclear crisis at the fukushima daiichi nuclear plant to a level 7 from 5.
